pr_title: CAMEL-15626: Use StringBuilder instead of StringBuffer

timeline.bodyText: StringBuffer is here intentionally because it is mutable and ensures locks. As aggregate method can be called in many threads in parallel, you need to ensure locking in different way (synchronized block, ReentrantLock, ...) before changing this to StringBuilder, otherwise the output will be corrupted.
timeline.author: bedlaj

replies.bodyText: Ok, so maybe it's just simpler to keep StringBuffer... I removed the changes on that file. Thanks
replies.author: mcserra
